permission.name: Pick Library For Asset
permission.description: Enables access to the asset library picking.

permission.name: Pick Any Library
permission.description: Asset can be added to any library.

permission.name: Open Collections
permission.description: Enables a list of open collections on the sidebar.

permission.name: Show Library Picker
permission.description: Show Libraries picker in header area

permission.name: Show Collection Picker
permission.description: Show Collections picker in header area

permission.name: Export Collection
permission.description: Move assets in a collection into a Library

permission.name: Add files to favorites
permission.description: Enables users to add files to their favorites collection

permission.name: View Folders in Collections
permission.description: Enables users to view folders inside collections
